field.name: start_date
field.title: Start Date
field.comment: The earliest date when this recurring schedule should start.

field.name: end_date
field.title: End Date
field.comment: The latest date when this recurring schedule should end (optional if number_of_occurrences is set).

field.name: repeat_unit
field.title: Repeat Unit
field.comment: Repetition interval unit: daily / weekly / monthly.

field.name: repeat_every
field.title: Repeat Every
field.comment: Repetition interval quantity (range from 1 - 30): e.g. repeat_unit = weekly, repeat_every = 2 means every 2 weeks.

field.name: repeat_on
field.title: Repeat On
field.comment: For weekly only - what day(s) of week.

field.name: repeat_by
field.title: Repeat By
field.comment: For monthly only - day of month (9th of month) or day of week (second wed of month).

field.name: number_of_occurrences
field.title: Number of Occurrences
field.comment: Total number of times this event should happen.

field.name: infinite_occurrence
field.title: Infinite Occurrence
field.comment: Is this an infinitely recurring series?
